channel.title: Help, please D:
channel.description:
Hey, guys... well, I am working on a server (not advertisement) and I was just wondering if it is possible to make the price for an item in tokkul. For example: A dragon chain body would be 300k tokkul...
Is this possible, and if so? How would I do it...
Thanks for your help. ~ Ziege Terra ~

item.title: Help, please D:
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Umm, okay, thanks… I’ll tell you how it goes ^^

Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2009, 11:44:43 pm[/size][hr]Hmm, I can’t seem to find any tuts on changing an items price into tokkul… but if any one does know… like i said, i would really appreciate it.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You could use an else-if statement.

P.S. Google something around ‘Rs2 server shop currency’ or something, there are tutorials out there.

item.title: Help, please D:
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Hmm, well… do you know how to make just one item cost tokkul… I’m not sure if that is what you just said but, would that just change everything to tokkul. I just want one item to be in tokkul…

Thanks alot…

Read full topic

item.title: Help, please D:
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Thanks alot, but is it possible to make only one shop have tokkul for money??

Read full topic

item.title: Help, please D:
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Ok open up client.java and search

GetItemSlot(995);

You should see something similar to this.

Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
				if (Slot == -1) {
					sendMessage("You don't have enough coins.");
					break;
				}
                        if(TotPrice2 <= 1)
                        {
                        TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
                        }
				if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
					if (freeSlots() > 0) {
						deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
						addItem(itemID, 1);
						server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
						server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
						if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
							server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
						}
					} else {
						sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory.");
						break;

Ok, see the line

Slot = GetItemSlot(995);

That means get the item “coins”.
Now change the 995 to the ID of whatever you want your currency to be.
Now just change this

sendMessage("You don't have enough coins");

To

sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul");

Now just change your selling option as well and you are done. =]

Read full topic
